full_summary:
====================================

### **Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) - Tender Announcement PSCH-2251991**

#### Tender Title
PCH - Fabrication and Delivery of Nylon Banners

#### Reference Number
WS3771598242-Doc3771645520

#### Invitation Type
**[English](#english)**: Request for Proposal
**[French](#french)**: Demande de propositions

#### Notice Type
**[English](#english)**: Request for Proposal
**[French](#french)**: Demande de propositions

#### Notice Status
This tender is now **closed**.

#### Solicitation Number
WS3771598242

#### Publication Date
November 30th, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date
December 21st, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Expected Contract Start Date
January 18th, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
Open-ended

#### Procurement Category
Professional Services

#### Procurement Method
**[English](#english)**: Competitive - Open bidding
**[French](#french)**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

#### Selection Criteria
**[English](#english)**: Lowest price
**[French](#french)**: Prix le plus bas

#### Trade Agreements
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
Nationwide

#### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity Name
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

#### End User Entities Name
Canadian Heritage (PCH)

#### Contact Information
**Name**: Andrea Keyserlingk (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email**: andrea.keyserlingk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Description
The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) is inviting contractors with experience in the fabrication and delivery of high tenacity, acid-dyed, nylon banners. The banners are intended for display on Confederation Boulevard, the ceremonial route in the heart of Canada's Capital. The successful bidder will be responsible for designing, manufacturing, and delivering the required quantities of banners within stipulated time frames. _______________________________________________________
Once you have rewritten the content, please highlight any changes you made to improve clarity, consistency, and coherence. Horse-sc-ace**

2. Organized
